thread.section_title: Parcel Monkey USA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Parcel Monkey USA | parcelmonkey.com | 2 of 8
thread.title: Happy Customer
thread.title_full: Parcel Monkey USA reviewed by Happy Customer

author: Happy Customer
title: Happy Customer
text:
It just worked. Was able to track my parcel all the way to Australia.
The one thing I think they should improve is just making it a little clearer what to do with the customs form when sending internationally and also make it clear that the initial destination of the package won't necessarily be the final destination but a Parcel Monkey cross dock. But still 5 stars.
